trans-unit.source: Defines which <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> to use for a specified set of Unicode code points and a culture-specific language.
trans-unit.target: 定义<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>用于一组指定的 Unicode 码位和特定于区域性的语言。

trans-unit.source: The FontFamilyMap also specifies a scale factor, allowing the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> size to be adjusted so that it better matches the size of other fonts used in the composite font family.
trans-unit.target: FontFamilyMap 还指定比例因子，允许目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>大小，使其更好地匹配复合字体系列中使用其他字体的大小调整。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture-specific language for the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的区域性特定语言<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Language property can refer to one of the following: - A specific language if the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap> applies to just that language.
trans-unit.target: 语言属性可以指以下项之一:-特定语言如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap>适用于只是该语言。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamilyMap>

trans-unit.source: - A neutral language if it applies to a group of related languages.
trans-unit.target: 的如果它适用于一组相关语言非特定语言。

trans-unit.source: - An empty string if it applies to any language.
trans-unit.target: 的如果它适用于任何语言一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"></xref> value representing the culture-specific language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage"> </xref>表示的区域性特定语言的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font scale factor for the target <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标的字体缩放比例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Scale allows the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> size to be adjusted so that it better matches the size of other fonts used in the composite font family.
trans-unit.target: 刻度允许目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>大小，使其更好地匹配复合字体系列中使用其他字体的大小调整。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The scale factor is relative to "em" units.
trans-unit.target: 相对于"em"单位是缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> value representing the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Double>值，该值表示的缩放比例。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1.0`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `1.0`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target font family name for which the Unicode range applies to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Unicode 范围适用于目标字体系列名称。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing the font family name.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值表示字体系列名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value representing one or more Unicode code point ranges.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示一个或多个 Unicode 码位范围的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: Each Unicode code point range is represented by the first and last code point in the range, for example, `"0000-00ff"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，由在范围中的第一个和最后一个码位表示每个 Unicode 码位范围`"0000-00ff"`。

trans-unit.source: The string of Unicode code point ranges is delimited by a comma, for example, `"0000-00ff, 00e0-00ef"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，采用逗号分隔的字符串的 Unicode 码位范围`"0000-00ff, 00e0-00ef"`。

trans-unit.source: A code page is a list of selected character codes (characters represented as code points) in a certain order.
trans-unit.target: 代码页是以特定顺序的所选的字符代码 （表示为码位的字符） 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Code pages are usually defined to support specific languages or groups of languages that share common writing systems.
trans-unit.target: 定义代码页通常是为了支持特定语言或组共享通用书写系统的语言。

trans-unit.source: Windows code pages contain 256 code points and are zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Windows 代码页包含 256 个码位，并且可以从零开始。

trans-unit.source: In most code pages, the code points 0 through 127 represent the same characters.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数代码页中，码位 0 到 127 表示相同的字符。

trans-unit.source: This allows for continuity and legacy code.
trans-unit.target: 这使得连续性和旧代码。

trans-unit.source: The code points 128 through 255 differ significantly between code pages.
trans-unit.target: 码位 128 到 255 代码页之间存在显著差异。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Encoding Support for Code Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5db4c290-41d5-41f5-a7e6-3ab0f4bfafae).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[编码代码页支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5db4c290-41d5-41f5-a7e6-3ab0f4bfafae)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value representing Unicode code point ranges.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>值，该值表示 Unicode 码位范围。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is "0000-10ffff".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"0000-10ffff"。

trans-unit.source: Unicode range not valid.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 范围无效。
